Materials Cloud Archive: Additional data are provided free of charge on the Materials Cloud Archive at https://archive.materialscloud.org/2019.0034/v1, including the AiiDA WorkChains used in this work; the AiiDA provenance graph; and the CURATED COF structures in CIF format. The archive record links to a DISCOVER section, where the structures and the main results of this work can be browsed interactively, as well as to an EXPLORE section with the interactive provenance browser ( https://www.materialscloud.org/discover/curated-cofs).
